description:
The anime takes place on the screw-shaped island country of Screw Island and follows the "Vocabot" Heybot and his partner, Prince Nejiru as they collect different "Vocab Screws". When the Vocabots wear the Vocab Screws on their heads, they're able to compete in "Vocab Battles," battles for who can think up and tell the best jokes.

(Source: Anime News Network)

tags.name: Time Manipulation
tags.description: Prominently features time-traveling or other time-warping phenomena.

tags.name: Meta
tags.description: Features fourth wall-breaking references to itself or genre tropes.

tags.name: Surreal Comedy
tags.description: Prominently features comedic moments that defy casual reasoning, resulting in illogical events.

tags.name: Body Horror
tags.description: Features characters who undergo horrific transformations or disfigurement, often to their own detriment.

tags.name: Shapeshifting
tags.description: Features character(s) who changes one's appearance or form.

tags.name: Memory Manipulation
tags.description: Prominently features a character(s) who has had their memories altered.

tags.name: Anti-Hero
tags.description: Features a protagonist who lacks conventional heroic attributes and may be considered a borderline villain.

tags.name: Gods
tags.description: Prominently features a character of divine or religious nature.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: Pandemic
tags.description: Prominently features a disease prevalent over a whole country or the world.

title.native: ヘボット まるわかりヘボヘボBOOK

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/dmpmutation)

**Shinji Ishihira** is a Japanese director, episode director and storyboard artist.

Full name: Brand-new idol SHiT (Shinsei Kuso Idol, 新生クソアイドル)

A Japanese idol group that was founded in 2015 by their manager Watanabe Junnosuke.
He is a professional screenwriter for anime, drama and theater and is a member of the Writers Guild of Japan.

__[Profile (Miracle Bus)](https://miraclebus.com/composer/tomotakaosumi)__

__Tomotaka Oosumi__ is a Japanese bassist, lyricist, composer and arranger who has been active since 2002. He is affiliated with the Miracle Bus Corporation.
